entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 4.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
